channel.title: Cordoba on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Cordoba on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Cordoba â€“ Spain
item.description: When we started planning for Andalusia we did not thought of Cordoba first. But later friends who had been there suggested visiting Cordoba. We walked from our hotel on the busy morning streets of Seville to reach the train station. We bought ticket for AVE (fast train) to Cordoba. The fair is not at all expensive compared to French standard as it costs almost similar from Paris CDG airport to city center.
